description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

v2.0.description:
This release has a number of changes and additions.
Changes:
- Classic Crash Team Racing for PS1 is now a separate manual from Crash Team Racing: Nitro Fueled. CTR:NF can be found at https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead
- The game name has been changed from CrashTeamRacingArcade to CrashTeamRacing as it now is not solely for Arcade mode.

Additions:
- Added Cups as optional inclusion.
- Added Time Trial as optional inclusion.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v1.3...v2.0
v2.0.title: Manual CTR v2.0

v2.1.description:
Fixed a bug that prevented generation with a larger number of worlds.

Also made sure the Manual version was up to date with the latest Stable version

## What's Changed
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v2.0...v2.1
v2.1.title: Manual CTR:NF v2.1

v3.0.description:
Updated to the latest version of Manual.

Fixed a bug where the Time Trial ghosts were not disabled when they should be.

Added items for Cups to unlock just like tracks to avoid generation problems.
Modified location categories to remove the big groups and sectioned cups into smaller categories.

## What's Changed
* Bug fixes and update to the current stable version of Manual by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/pull/5


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v2.1...v3.0
v3.0.title: Manual CTR v3.0

v3.1.description:
Actually fixed Turbo Track this time.

## What's Changed
* Fix Turbo Track...again by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/pull/6


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v3.0...v3.1
v3.1.title: Manual CTR v3.1

v4.1.description:
Added a yaml option for how Cups are unlocked.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v3.1...v4.1
v4.1.title: Manual CTR v4.1

v4.2.description:
Fixed a bug where the game always counted Turbo Track for determining the Trophy count.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v4.0...v4.2
v4.2.title: Manual CTR v4.2

v4.3.description:
Changed N. Tropy and N. Oxide Ghosts to Progressive Ghosts.
Added Characters as Filler Items to shake things up.

Future plan is to make characters optional and also give a choice of all characters or just the starting characters.

Also, MarioSpore has joined the team (me) to work on this project. Welcome!

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v4.2...v4.3
v4.3.title: v4.3

v4.4.description:
Starting Track and Character are now automatically given, and starting track location has been removed.
Randomized characters are now optional.
Time Trial Ghosts now have different items depending on which ghosts are enabled.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v4.3...v4.4
v4.4.title: Manual CTR v4.4

v4.5.description:
Characters and tracks have had categories added to them to make finding specific driving styles for characters or tracks from a specific cup easier.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v4.4...v4.5
v4.5.title: Manual CTR v4.5

v4.6.description:
Removed the "dummy" victory location and the Ultimate Trophy item.
Also tidied some of the unneeded commented code.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracing_hallstead/compare/v4.5...v4.6
v4.6.title: Manual CTR v4.6
